---
name: Robot Repo Submission (Markdown)
about: Submit a robot repository to feature in URDF Robot Gallery.
title: "[Robot Repo] "
labels: robot-repo
---

Thanks for sharing your robot repo! Please include a **GitHub repo link**, a **one-line summary**, and (optionally) the **author/company**.

**Required**
- GitHub repo URL:
- Short summary:

**Optional**
- Robot / project name:
- Author / Company / Lab:
- Tags:
- Robots inside the repo (one per line):
  - Example: `SO100 — urdf/so100.urdf`

**Example**
- Repo: https://github.com/acme/so100
- Summary: Lightweight humanoid arm with URDF + meshes
- Author: Acme Robotics
- Robots: SO100 — urdf/so100.urdf
